_header: All lust and liking I begin to leave
_description: A lover’s plea — one quatrain and three 8-line stanzas with refrain, ‘pyte comfort your daungernesse’

CamTCC599.First Lines:
[A]ll lust and lykyng I begyn to lede leueAllas y lost ys all my
                    wordly blysseNow all myrthes wyll fro me meueBut pyte comfort your
                    daungernes…
CamTCC599.Last Lines:
…Socoure your seruaunt that suyth yow ayAnd lete pyte comfort
                    your daungernesse
CamTCC599.Note:
Written as two 7-line stanzas, one six-line stanza, and one 8-line
                    stanza.
